scripts.build: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/*.js && node cdc-accelerator/build/build.js
scripts.build-feature: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/*.js && node cdc-accelerator/feature/index.js build
scripts.deploy: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node cdc-accelerator/build/build.js && node cdc-accelerator/deploy/deploy.js
scripts.deploy-feature: npm run build-feature && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node cdc-accelerator/feature/index.js deploy
scripts.start: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node cdc-accelerator/build/build.js && light-server -c .lightserverrc
scripts.start-feature: babel --delete-dir-on-start src -d build && prettier --semi true --trailing-comma none --write build/**/webScreenSets/**/*.js && node cdc-accelerator/feature/index.js build && light-server -c .lightserverrc
